description:
Video Game addiction is a big problem in today's online world. Kids lock themselves in bedrooms for hours on end.

David's son was "Educationally powerless but in "Call Of Duty" (he) commands an army". Delusional!

David is not only a Graphic designer working with Video Game makers, he also has a son who is a video game addict and another who he has helped through the addiction to lead a normal life, and working on the other.

You will learn the difference between addiction and obsession, what to do, how to handle it, and how to help your child (or someone you love) overcome this anti-social addiction.

You have more control over your child than you think. Regain the power in your relationship with your child now before it is too late. (Need some proof? Watch the video interview with a man with 2 boys 30 and 34 - Don't let this happen to your family).
title: Help! My Son Is Addicted to Video Games.
